1TRiJiVYdJg.title: 15 PROMPT PATTERNS to ENHANCE ChatGPT Use
1TRiJiVYdJg.author: Mayomi AI
1TRiJiVYdJg.description:
In a paper by Vanderbilt University, titled A Prompt Pattern Catalog to Enhance Prompt Engineering with ChatGPT, researchers and scholars deep in the field of AI and LLMs wrote out a comprehensive overview of various prompt patterns that can be used to enhance interaction with conversational Large Language Models (LLMs) like ChatGPT. 

The importance of knowing these prompt patterns is to equip you with the ability to enhance the effectiveness and efficiency of your interaction on knowing how to use ChatGPT. 
#chatgpt #chatpgttips #promptengineering
